attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please sign this to tell the government that we will no longer put up with puppy farming. Please sign to end all puppy farming and selling of puppy farmed pups. Its cruel and unnecessary. The dogs are left to live in cruel and dirty conditions often not getting fed or given water. The pups are then snatched away and sold to he highest bider. The dogs that are used for breeding are continually breed until they can breed no more then dumped or killed. They are left to live in prisons of darkness and dirt. With no contact or light. Please sign this to make the government take action and end the utterly unnecessary suffering of these poor animals.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "BAN PUPPY FARMS"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15748.asp

Prime Minister's Office
